title: Inside My Shorts: 30 Quickies
description: When it comes to stories (and other things) I believe that size doesn't matter. It's what you do with it that counts.Here you will find 31 quickies. Romance, horror, comedy, and a bit of science fiction. You'll laugh, you'll cry, you may even. You may love them or hate them, but you won't forget them.I promise.I am Splinker. Read me roar
author: Adam Sifre
